title: relecov-tools Schema.
description: Json Schema that specifies the structure, content, and validation rules for relecov-tools

organism.description: Taxonomic species name of the organism.
organism.label: Organism

public_health_sample_id.description: Identificator provided by the Public Health system
public_health_sample_id.label: Public Health sample id (SIVIRA)

collecting_lab_sample_id.description: Sample ID provided by the laboratory that collects the sample, the collecting institution is requested in column L of this file
collecting_lab_sample_id.label: Sample ID given by originating laboratory

submitting_lab_sample_id.description: Sample ID provided by the submitting laboratory that delivers the sample. The submitting laboratory is requested in column M
submitting_lab_sample_id.label: Sample ID given by the submitting laboratory

microbiology_lab_sample_id.description: Sample identification provided by the microbiology laboratory
microbiology_lab_sample_id.label: Sample ID given in the microbiology lab

isolate_sample_id.description: Sample identification provided if multiple rna-extraction or passages
isolate_sample_id.label: Sample ID given if multiple rna-extraction or passages

sequencing_sample_id.description: ID assigned to the sample for sequencing. It must be a unique identifier. If the sample is re-sequenced, the run number should be included, preceded by a dot.
sequencing_sample_id.label: Sample ID given for sequencing

ena_sample_accession.description: ID generated when uploading the sample to ENA
ena_sample_accession.label: ENA Sample ID

gisaid_virus_name.description: The user-defined GISAID virus name assigned to the sequence.
gisaid_virus_name.label: GISAID Virus Name

sequencing_institution.description: The name of the agency that generated the sequence
sequencing_institution.label: Sequencing Institution

sample_collection_date.description: The date on which the sample was collected. YYYY-MM-DD
sample_collection_date.label: Sample Collection Date

sample_received_date.description: The date on which the sample was received. YYYY-MM-DD
sample_received_date.label: Sample Received Date

purpose_sampling.description: The reason that the sample was collected.
purpose_sampling.label: Purpose of sampling

sample_storage_conditions.description: Conditions under which the sample is stored
sample_storage_conditions.label: Biological Sample Storage Condition

specimen_source.description: Source of the specimen, merge of anatomical_part, anatomical_material, body_product and collection method.
specimen_source.label: Specimen source

environmental_material.description: A substance obtained from the natural or man-made environment e.g. soil, water, sewage, door handle, bed handrail, face mask.
environmental_material.label: Environmental Material

environmental_system.description: A data field which describes an environmental location as a site in the natural or built environment.
environmental_system.label: Environmental System

collection_device.description: A data field which describes the instrument or container used to collect the sample.
collection_device.label: Collection Device

host_common_name.description: The commonly used name of the host.
host_common_name.label: Host

host_age_years.description: Age of host at the time of sampling. Age between 3 and 110 years old. Recommended
host_age_years.label: Host Age Years

host_age_months.description: ONLY when [Host Age years] < 3. Age of host at the time of sampling. If the age is less than three years indicate in months between 0 and 36. Recommended
host_age_months.label: Host Age Months

host_gender.description: The gender of the host at the time of sample collection. Recomended
host_gender.label: Host Gender

vaccinated.description: A status indicating that an individual has received a vaccination.
vaccinated.label: Vaccinated

medicated.description: Has received medication for the identified treatment or prophylaxis
medicated.label: Specific medication for treatment or prophylaxis

hospitalized.description: Whether the patient was admitted to a hospital
hospitalized.label: Hospitalization

icu_admission.description: Whether the patient required ICU care during the illness.
icu_admission.label: Admission to intensive care unit

death.description: Whether the patient died as a result of the infection.
death.label: Death

immunosuppressed.description: Whether the patient has a weakened immune system.
immunosuppressed.label: Immunosuppression

sequencing_date.description: The date the sample was sequenced. YYYY-MM-DD
sequencing_date.label: Sequencing Date

authors.description: A data field which describes the names of individuals contributing to the processes of sample collection, sequence generation, analysis, and data submission.
authors.label: Authors

sequence_file_R1.label: Sequence file R1

sequence_file_R2.description: A data field which describes the user-specified filename of the read 2 (r2) FASTQ file.
sequence_file_R2.label: Sequence file R2

batch_id.label: Batch identifier

institution_code.description: Code assigned to each institution from REGCESS and ESRI
institution_code.label: Institution code

submitting_institution_id.description: The Institution identifier that is submitting data or information.
submitting_institution_id.label: Submitting Institution Identifier

collecting_institution_email.description: The email address of the contact responsible for follow-up regarding the sample.
collecting_institution_email.label: Originating Laboratory Email

submitting_institution_email.description: The email address of the contact responsible for follow-up regarding the sequence.
submitting_institution_email.label: Submitting Institution Email

examples: 123 Sunnybrooke St, Toronto, Ontario, M4P 1L6, Canada
submitting_institution_address.description: The mailing address of the agency submitting the sequence.

enum: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands [GAZ:00003990]
geo_loc_country.description: The country of origin of the sample.
geo_loc_country.label: Country

geo_loc_state.description: The state/province/territory of origin of the sample.
geo_loc_state.label: Autonomic Community

geo_loc_region.description: The county/region of origin of the sample.
geo_loc_region.label: Province

geo_loc_city.description: The city of origin of the sample.
geo_loc_city.label: City

geo_loc_latitude.description: The latitude coordinates of the geographical location of sample collection.
geo_loc_latitude.label: Geo Loc Latitude

study_type.description: The nature of the investigation or the investigational use for which the study is being done
study_type.label: Study type

geo_loc_longitude.description: The longitude coordinates of the geographical location of sample collection.
geo_loc_longitude.label: Geo Loc Longitude

anatomical_material.description: A substance obtained from an anatomical part of an organism e.g. tissue, blood.
anatomical_material.label: Anatomical Material

anatomical_part.description: A data field which describes the substance obtained from an anatomical part of an organism.
anatomical_part.label: Anatomical Part

collection_method.description: A data field which describes the process used to collect the sample.
collection_method.label: Collection Method

body_product.description: A data field which describes the substance excreted/secreted from an organism.
body_product.label: Body Product

tax_id.description: The NCBITaxon identifier for the organism being sequenced.
tax_id.label: Tax ID

host_scientific_name.description: The taxonomic, or scientific name of the host.
host_scientific_name.label: Host Scientific Name

host_disease.description: The name of the disease experienced by the host.
host_disease.label: Host disease

enum: Sample has epidemiological link to Variant of Concern (VoC) [GENEPIO:0100273]
Sample has epidemiological link to Omicron Variant [GENEPIO:0100274]
Surveillance of international border crossing by air travel or ground transport [GENEPIO:0100015]
Surveillance of international border crossing by air travel [GENEPIO:0100016]
Surveillance of international border crossing by ground transport [GENEPIO:0100017]
purpose_of_sequencing.description: The reason that the sample was sequenced.
purpose_of_sequencing.label: Purpose of Sequencing

if_enrichment_panel_assay_version_other.description: A form or variant of software; one of a sequence of copies of a software program, each incorporating new modifications.
if_enrichment_panel_assay_version_other.label: If Enrichment panel/assay version Is Other, Specify

amplicon_pcr_primer_scheme.description: The specifications of the primers (primer sequences, binding positions, fragment size generated etc) used to generate the amplicons to be sequenced.
amplicon_pcr_primer_scheme.label: Amplicon Pcr Primer Scheme

sequencing_instrument_platform.description: A sequencing plaform (brand) is a name of a company that produces sequencer equipment.
sequencing_instrument_platform.label: Sequencing Instrument Platform

read_length.description: number of base pairs per read
read_length.label: Read length

number_of_reads.description: The number of nucleotides successfully ordered from each side of a nucleic acid fragment obtained after the completion of a sequencing process.
number_of_reads.label: Read count

sequence_file_R1_md5.description: Checksum md5 value to validate successful file transmission in R1
sequence_file_R1_md5.label: Sequence fastq R1 md5

sequence_file_R2_md5.description: Checksum md5 value to validate successful file transmission in R2
sequence_file_R2_md5.label: Sequence fastq R2 md5

sequence_file_path_R1.description: The filepath of the r1 FASTQ file.
sequence_file_path_R1.label: Filepath R1

sequence_file_path_R2.description: The filepath of the r2 FASTQ file.
sequence_file_path_R2.label: Filepath R2

fast5_filename.description: The user-specified filename of the FAST5 file.
fast5_filename.label: Filename fast5

fast5_filepath.description: The filepath of the FAST5 file.
fast5_filepath.label: Filepath fast5

bioinformatics_analysis_date.description: The time of a sample analysis process YYYY-MM-DD
bioinformatics_analysis_date.label: processing_date

dehosting_method_software_name.description: The method used to remove host reads from the pathogen sequence.
dehosting_method_software_name.label: Dehosting Method

dehosting_method_software_version.description: The method version used to remove host reads from the pathogen sequence.
dehosting_method_software_version.label: Dehosting Method Version

reference_genome_accession.description: A persistent, unique identifier of a genome database entry.
reference_genome_accession.label: Reference genome accession

bioinformatics_protocol_software_name.description: The name of the bioinformatics protocol used.
bioinformatics_protocol_software_name.label: Bioinformatics protocol

if_bioinformatic_protocol_is_other_speci.description: The name of the bioinformatics protocol used.
if_bioinformatic_protocol_is_other_speci.label: If bioinformatics protocol Is Other, Specify

bioinformatics_protocol_software_version.description: The version number of the bioinformatics protocol used.
bioinformatics_protocol_software_version.label: Bioinformatics protocol version

commercial_open_source_both.description: If bioinformatics protocol used was open-source or commercial
commercial_open_source_both.label: Commercial/Open-source/both

preprocessing_software_version.description: Version of the preprocessing software used.
preprocessing_software_version.label: Preprocessing software version

assembly.description: Software used for assembly of the pathogen genome.
assembly.label: Assembly software

assembly_version.description: Version of the software used for assembly of the pathogen genome.
assembly_version.label: Assembly software version

if_variant_calling_other.description: Specify if you have used another variant calling software
if_variant_calling_other.label: If variant calling Is Other, Specify

consensus_sequence_name.description: The name of the consensus sequence.
consensus_sequence_name.label: Consensus sequence name

consensus_sequence_filename.description: The name of the consensus sequence filename
consensus_sequence_filename.label: Consensus sequence filename

consensus_sequence_md5.description: The md5 of the consensus sequence.
consensus_sequence_md5.label: Consensus sequence name md5

consensus_sequence_filepath.description: The filepath of the consesnsus sequence file.
consensus_sequence_filepath.label: Consensus sequence filepath

long_table_path.description: The path where the long table including all variants and annotations is.
long_table_path.label: Long table path

consensus_sequence_software_name.description: The name of software used to generate the consensus sequence.
consensus_sequence_software_name.label: Consensus software

if_consensus_other.description: Specify if you have used another consensus software
if_consensus_other.label: If consensus Is Other, Specify

consensus_sequence_software_version.description: The version of the software used to generate the consensus sequence.
consensus_sequence_software_version.label: Consensus software version

consensus_genome_length.description: Size of the assembled genome described as the number of base pairs.
consensus_genome_length.label: Consensus genome length

depth_of_coverage_threshold.description: The threshold used as a cut-off for the depth of coverage.
depth_of_coverage_threshold.label: Depth of coverage threshold

number_of_reads_sequenced.description: The number of total reads generated by the sequencing process.
number_of_reads_sequenced.label: Number of reads sequenced

pass_reads.description: Number of reads that pass quality control threshold
pass_reads.label: Number of reads passing filters

per_reads_host.description: Percentage of reads mapped to host
per_reads_host.label: %Reads host

per_reads_virus.description: Percentage of reads mapped to virus
per_reads_virus.label: %Reads virus

per_unmapped.description: Percentage of reads unmapped to virus or to host
per_unmapped.label: %Unmapped

depth_of_coverage_value.description: The average number of reads representing each nucleotide in the reconstructed sequence.
depth_of_coverage_value.label: Depth of coverage Mean value

per_genome_greater_10x.description: Percentage of genome with coverage greater than 10x
per_genome_greater_10x.label: % Genome > 10x

ns_per_100_kbp.description: The number of N symbols present in the consensus fasta sequence, per 100kbp of sequence.
ns_per_100_kbp.label: Ns per 100 kbp

number_of_variants_in_consensus.description: The number of variants found in consensus sequence
number_of_variants_in_consensus.label: Number of variants (AF > 75%)

variant_name.description: The variant classification of the lineage i.e. alpha, beta, etc.
variant_name.label: Variant Name

variant_designation.description: The variant classification of the lineage i.e. variant, variant of concern.
variant_designation.label: Variant designation

ena_analysis_accession.description: A data field which describes the GenBank/ENA/DDBJ identifier assigned to the sequence in the International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration (INSDC) archives. GenBank = National Genetic Sequence Data Base; ENA = European Nucleotide Archive; DDBJ = DNA DataBank of Japan Example Guidance: Store the accession returned from a GenBank/ENA/DDBJ submission (viral genome assembly).
ena_analysis_accession.label: Analysis Accession

ena_study_accession.description: An identifier data field which describes the International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration (INSDC) accession number of the BioProject(s) to which the BioSample belongs.
ena_study_accession.label: Study accession

ena_run_accession.description: Run Identifier: A sequence of characters used to uniquely identify a particular run of a test on a particular batch of samples.
ena_run_accession.label: Run Accession

examples: e.g Illumina MiSeq paired end sequencing
ena_experiment_title.description: Experiment Name: The name assigned to an experiment.
ena_experiment_title.label: Experiment title

examples: e.g SARS-CoV-2 genomes from late April in Stockholm
study_title.label: Study title

ena_study_alias.description: A study is a process that realizes the steps of a study design.
ena_study_alias.label: Study alias

ena_first_created_date.description: The date on which the activity or entity is created.
ena_first_created_date.label: First created date

examples: Sample from Belgian Covid-19 patient. Sample was obtained at the Hospital AZ Rivierenland, in Antwerp, Belgium.
ena_sample_description.description: Free text description of the sample.
ena_sample_description.label: Sample Description

collector_name.description: Name of the person who collected the specimen
collector_name.label: Sample collector name

experiment_alias.description: A coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data, with the ultimate goal of discovery or hypothesis testing.
experiment_alias.label: Experiment alias

run_alias.description: A sequence of characters used to uniquely identify a particular run of a test on a particular batch of samples.
run_alias.label: Run Alias

clade_assignment.description: An indication of the taxonomic clade grouping of organisms.
clade_assignment.label: Clade Assignment

clade_assignment_software_name.description: The name of the software used to determine the clade.
clade_assignment_software_name.label: Clade Assignment Software Name

if_clade_assignment_other.description: Other software used to determine clade.
if_clade_assignment_other.label: Other Clade Assignment Software

clade_assignment_software_version.description: The version of the software used to determine the clade.
clade_assignment_software_version.label: Clade Assignment Software Version

clade_assignment_software_database_versi.description: Version of the search database to determine the clade.
clade_assignment_software_database_versi.label: Clade Assignment Software Database Version

clade_assignment_date.description: Date when the clade analysis was performed via Nextclade
clade_assignment_date.label: Clade Assignment Date

lineage_assignment.description: An indication of the taxonomic lineage grouping of organisms.
lineage_assignment.label: Lineage Assignment

lineage_assignment_software_name.description: The name of the software used to determine the lineage.
lineage_assignment_software_name.label: Lineage Assignment Software Name

if_lineage_assignment_other.description: Other software used to determine lineage.
if_lineage_assignment_other.label: Other Lineage Assignment Software

lineage_assignment_software_version.description: The version of the software used to determine the lineage.
lineage_assignment_software_version.label: Lineage Assignment Software Version

lineage_algorithm_software_version.description: Version of the algorithm used by the lineage assignment software
lineage_algorithm_software_version.label: Lineage Algorithm Software Version

lineage_assignment_scorpio_version.description: The version of the scorpio data used to determine the lineage.
lineage_assignment_scorpio_version.label: Lineage Assignment Scorpio Version

lineage_assignment_constellation_version.description: The version of the constellations databases used to determine the lineage.
lineage_assignment_constellation_version.label: Lineage Assignment Constellation Version

lineage_assignment_date.description: Date when the lineage analysis was performed
lineage_assignment_date.label: Lineage Assignment Date

lineage_assignment_file.description: File containing results from lineage analysis
lineage_assignment_file.label: Lineage Assignment File

lineage_assignment_database_version.description: Version of the lineage assignment database
lineage_assignment_database_version.label: Pangolin Database Version

type_assignment.description: An indication of the taxonomic grouping of organisms.
type_assignment.label: Type Assignment

type_assignment_software_name.description: The name of the software used to determine the type.
type_assignment_software_name.label: Type Assignment Software Name

if_type_assignment_software_other.description: Other software iused to determine Type.
if_type_assignment_software_other.label: Other Type Assignment Software

type_assignment_software_version.description: The version of the software used to determine thetype.
type_assignment_software_version.label: Type Assignment Software Version

subtype_assignment.description: An indication of the taxonomic grouping of organisms.
subtype_assignment.label: Subtype Assignment

subtype_assignment_software_name.description: The name of the software used to determine the subtype.
subtype_assignment_software_name.label: Subtype Assignment Software Name

if_subtype_assignment_software_other.description: Other software used to determine Subtype.
if_subtype_assignment_software_other.label: Other Subtype Assignment Software

subtype_assignment_software_version.description: The version of the software used to determine the subtype.
subtype_assignment_software_version.label: Subtype Assignment Software Version
